gr.interamerican.wicket.bo2.factories
Class ActionFactory

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.wicket.bo2.factories.ActionFactory

public class ActionFactory
extends Object

Factory for Callback actions. This factory creates Bo2WicketBlocks.

Method Detail

crudAction

public static <K extends Serializable & Comparable<? super K>,P extends PersistentObject<K>,Q extends Question<K> & PoDependent<P>> CallbackAction crudAction(BeanPanelDef<P> definition,
                                                                                                                                                            Class<P> poClass,
                                                                                                                                                            Class<Q> questionClass,
                                                                                                                                                            CrudPerformer performer)
Creates a CRUD action for a BeanPanel.

Type Parameters:
K - Type of key. Type of answer for the key question.
P - Type of persistent object.
Q - Type of key question.
Parameters:
definition - Panel definition.
poClass - Class of PersistentObject.
questionClass - Class of question that retrieves a new key for the persistent object.
performer - CRUD performer for the operation.
Returns:
Returns the action.

queryAction

public static <C extends Serializable,B extends Serializable,Q extends EntitiesQuery<B> & CriteriaDependent<C>> CallbackAction queryAction(SearchFlowPanelDef<C,B> definition,
                                                                                                                                          Class<Q> queryClass)
Creates a query action for a SearchFlowPanel.

Type Parameters:
C - Type of criteria.
B - Type of entity searched by the search flow panel.
Q - Type of query.
Parameters:
definition - SearchFlowPanel definition.
queryClass - Class of query.
Returns:
Returns the query action.

addNextLAction

public static <B extends Serializable> CallbackAction addNextLAction(CrudPickerPanelDef<B> definition,
                                                                     Object owner,
                                                                     String collectionName,
                                                                     String indexPropertyName)
Creates a CallbackAction that will add a new item to the appropriate set of an owner object. This action is intended to be used by a CrudPickerPanel that modifies an object's Set. In the case that an object has a property that is of type Set, and the model list of the CrudPickerPanel is created by the elements of the Set, then this CallBack action can be used in order to add the new element in the Set. This action will synchronize the CrudPickerPanel's list with the object's set. The new Object will be added to the document with the method CollectionUtils.addNextL(set, object)

Type Parameters:
B - Type of object in the Set.
Parameters:
definition - Panel definition of the panel that uses this action.
owner - Object that contains the Set, that is displayed in the CrudPickerPanel.
collectionName - Name of the property that returns the Collection.
indexPropertyName - Name of the index property of B.
Returns:
Returns a CallBack action.

addNextIAction

public static <B extends Serializable> CallbackAction addNextIAction(CrudPickerPanelDef<B> definition,
                                                                     Object owner,
                                                                     String collectionName,
                                                                     String indexPropertyName)
Creates a CallbackAction that will add a new item to the appropriate set of an owner object. This action is intended to be used by a CrudPickerPanel that modifies an object's Set. In the case that an object has a property that is of type Set, and the model list of the CrudPickerPanel is created by the elements of the Set, then this CallBack action can be used in order to add the new element in the Set. This action will synchronize the CrudPickerPanel's list with the object's set. The new Object will be added to the document with the method CollectionUtils.addNextI(set, object)

Type Parameters:
B - Type of object in the Set.
Parameters:

owner - Object that contains the Set, that is displayed in the CrudPickerPanel.
collectionName - Name of the property that returns the Collection.
indexPropertyName - Name of the index property of B.
Returns:

removeAction

public static <B extends Serializable> CallbackAction removeAction(CrudPickerPanelDef<B> definition,
                                                                   Object owner,
                                                                   String collectionName)
Creates a CallbackAction that will add a new item to the appropriate set of an owner object. This action is intended to be used by a CrudPickerPanel that modifies an object's Set. In the case that an object has a property that is of type Set, and the model list of the CrudPickerPanel is created by the elements of the Set, then this CallBack action can be used in order to add the new element in the Set. This action will synchronize the CrudPickerPanel's list with the object's set. The new Object will be added to the document with the method CollectionUtils.addNextI(set, object)

Type Parameters:

Parameters:

owner - Object that contains the Set, that is displayed in the CrudPickerPanel.
collectionName - Name of the property that returns the Collection.
Returns:
